title: XYRA Corp. Announces Strategic Focus on Honduras as a Priority Remittance & Digital Transfers Market
description:
CHATSWORTH, Calif., Dec. 04, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- XYRA Corp., an AI-driven, quantum-secure payment network uniting remittances, fintech, and crypto assets under one tokenized, compliant infrastructure, and a subsidiary of Cavitation Technologies, Inc.
